meanings.sent1: She felt unworried about the upcoming test.
meanings.sent2: He appeared unworried as he strolled through the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed unworried by the loud noises outside.
meanings.sent4: Her unworried demeanor was like a calm lake on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The unworried smile on his face was contagious.

meanings.sent1: The child was unworried about the dark room.
meanings.sent2: After finishing his work, he felt unworried and content.
meanings.sent3: The unworried attitude of the dog made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unworried mind was a sanctuary in the chaos of life.
meanings.sent5: The unworried expression on her face was a picture of peace.
